name: large hammer walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a large clamp and a jackhammer. large spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: large wrecking walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a motor, a set of chains, and a menacing bludgeon. large spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: large saw walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with several motors and nasty saws. large spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: large drill walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a large clamp, meant to hold prey into several powerful drills. large spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: large blade walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a large, sharp blade attached to heavy duty flexible material, pulled taut by a powerful motor and held by heavy-duty pins..

name: large jaw walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a massive hydraulic jaw. large spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: large flame walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a massive hydraulic flame. large spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: large exterminator walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with tanks of insecticidal gas and powerful pincers. large spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: large flash walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with several hoses attached to a large tank of flash and powerful pincers. large spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.
